reviewText: It's an ok episode if you like Pa Cartwright the best. Guest star, [Recardo Montalban] story line;Season 2 / episode 39...10/22/60Ben's life is saved by Malsou , an outcast Indian,and his wife. in gratitudeBen gives Malsou some landand a new start in life, much to the horror of neighbor like Dagget who hates Indians. When his wife is killed in a night time raid, Dagget blames Malsou and kills his wife.
